mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mis_account_apply (year, month, day) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day})
mapper.select: SELECT t5.id, t5.year, t5.month, t5.day, concat(t5.year, '-', t5.month, '-', t5.day) accountDate, t4.outSumPrice, t4.inSumPrice FROM (SELECT t3.applyId, MAX(CASE t3.type WHEN '1' THEN sumPrice ELSE 0 END) outSumPrice, MAX(CASE t3.type WHEN '2' THEN sumPrice ELSE 0 END) inSumPrice FROM ( SELECT t2.type, sum(t1.price) sumPrice, t1.applyId FROM mis_account_detail t1 LEFT JOIN mis_account_type t2 ON t1.typeId = t2.id GROUP BY t2.type, t1.applyId ) t3 GROUP BY t3.applyId) t4 LEFT JOIN mis_account_apply t5 ON t4.applyId = t5.id
